Metadata.title: Tigran & Mariam
Metadata.description: We cordially invite you to share with us the important and memorable day of our lives

WeddingDate.invitation_text: Dear Friends, A beautiful celebration is awaited in our lives. We are forming a family and inviting you to join us on one of the most significant days of our lives. We are thrilled to extend our invitation to you for our upcoming wedding ceremony, which will take place

InvitationPlaces.waiting_with_love: We hope to see you there!
InvitationPlaces.waiting_for_reply: Please, fill the blank by 1st of June

wedding_ceremony.place_name: Saint Mother of God the Mighty Church
